# Tree

Class that represent an arbitary tree

## constructor

**Parameters**

-   `key` **[string](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String)** 
-   `meta` **any** 
-   `parent` **[Tree](#tree)?** 

## getKey

Get node's key

## getMeta

Get node's meta

## addChild

**Parameters**

-   `key` **[string](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String)** 
-   `meta` **any**

**Parameters**

## getParent

## removeChild

## hasChildren
